short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will store the urls of all the tabs opened in the current window in a file. And it is possible to load it back

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save all the tabs in chrome.
This extension will save the urls of all the tabs opened in the current chrome window in a json file. And later at any time; you use that file to load the tabs.
